title: Japan Confucian view of Christianity SAQ

content.question: Answer all parts of the questions: a) Identify ONE way in which Hakuseki’s argument was influenced by long-standing Asian cultural traditions. b) Explain ONE way in which the religious encounter referred to in the passage differed from most other religious encounters in the period circa 1450–1750. c) Explain ONE historical situation in the period 1450–1750, other than the one illustrated in the passage, in which states in Asia or Africa adopted policies to limit European political power or cultural influence.
